text: If I create a custom object that includes a boolean and associate it with a contact. Any modification to that object will modify it for all associations. For example, if I that custom object boolean to `true` then everywhere that custom object appears that property value will be `true` . Is that right?
and if the above is right, do I use the new "association labels" to indicate if for this record association the relationship is uniquely true/false (as a simple example)
